publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-648 Rhoda Grant: Congratulations to Kenny Simmâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Kenny Simm from Brae, Shetland Islands, on his selection as part of the British Bobsleigh Team for the forthcoming Europa Cup competition and wishes him well in his quest to be selected for the 2010 Winter Olympic Games. Supported by: Elizabeth Smith*, Nanette Milne*, Bashir Ahmad*, Peter Peacock*, David Stewart*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Tavish Scott*, Robin Harper*
S3M-648 Congratulations to Kenny Simm (lodged on 16 October 2007) Mary Mulligan*
S3M-648 Congratulations to Kenny Simm (lodged on 16 October 2007) Elaine Smith*
